subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: In Ecuador, the name Barcelona is associated with a club founded in Guayaquil that resonates much as Messi & Company do in Spain. But lately the team has struggled financially and on the field.
snippet: In Ecuador, the name Barcelona is associated with a club founded in Guayaquil that resonates much as Messi & Company do in Spain. But lately the team has struggled financially and on the field.
